channel.title: IllusionX
channel.description:
Hello everyone, Welcome to the new launch of IllusionX, Myself, And my staff have recently been developing this 718, To be one of the best servers out.
It has many things for players to do, With daily updates. Myself as an owner, I like to listen to the community's opinions to see what we can improve to make their gaming experience better for them.
IllusionX was originally a Spawn-Pk Matrix Server, I have changed pretty much everything from top to bottom, Addded / Fixed skilling, Fixing the economy prices, And setting everything right.
If you want to enjoy, Have a great and friendly community, And help contribute to making my server better, Feel free to join at www.illusionx317.com.
Here are some pictures.
Faladore Home! http://prntscr.com/2k12te
Runecrafting! http://prntscr.com/2k19fm
Dungeoneering! http://prntscr.com/2k14li
Dicing Area! http://prntscr.com/2k13pz
Trading Area! http://prntscr.com/2k13w3

item.description:

Thats just the website Domain, Use to be a 317, But not anymore.

item.title: IllusionX
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Use img tags. People won’t click all those links one by one. Otherwise, good luck. Don’t like the era tbh.

Read full topic
